result.execSummary:
The defendant Travis J. Burrow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
9 months jail on each count, concurrent with each other but consecutive to prison sentences Def is presently serving (Rock Co. 16CF749 and 16CF1815 and Grant Co. 16CF49). This jail is imposed/stayed for 2 years probation. 27 days credit in the event of revocation with jail that can be served in any Wisconsin county that will accept.
Consecutive to: Rock Co. 16CF749 and 16CF1815 and Grant Co. 16CF49

Conditions of probation: Pay 1 set of court costs in 16CM23; costs for count 2 and for 16CM47 have been waived by the Court. Also, attend, pay for, and successfully complete any education, counseling or programming ordered by the agent.
Consecutive to: Rock Co. 16CF749, 16CF1815, and Grant County 16CF49

records.addlTxt: Appearances by DA Jennifer Harper for the State, Defendant (in custody) with Atty. Peter Bartelt. Plea/sentencing in 16CM23 and 16CM47 (counsel have advised that 16CM12 will be DRI). Plea agreement stated. Def pleads no contest to counts 1 and 2/bail jumping in 16CM23 and count 1/bail jumping in 16CM47. Court's colloquy on pleas. Finding of guilty. Sentence: 9 months jail on each count, concurrent with each other but consecutive to prison sentences Def is presently serving (Rock Co. 16CF749 and 16CF1815 and Grant Co. 16CF49). This jail is imposed/stayed for 2 years probation. 27 days credit in the event of revocation with jail that can be served in any Wisconsin county that will accept. Conditions of probation: Pay 1 set of court costs in 16CM23; costs for count 2 and for 16CM47 have been waived by the Court. Also, attend, pay for, and successfully complete any education, counseling or programming ordered by the agent. Remaining counts in 16CM47 and 16CM12 DRI.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 14, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

16CM12, 16CM23, and 16CM47.  1:40 p.m. Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Defendant Travis J. Burrow. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Travis J. Burrow not in court. Def is presently at Oshkosh Correctional. Writ was not done to secure his appearance today. DA asks for reset. Court sets 6/14 at 1:30.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 14, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
